item.title: yakLab Part 2: GlusterFS distributed volumes
item.description: Now that we can manage our lab infrastructure (both the virtual and the baremetal) it’s time to start doing something a bit more fun. In this scene we’ll use Ansible to deploy GlusterFS to give us persistant network storage for our Kubernetes cluster.
